                                     UNITED STATES SECURITIES AND       OMB APPROVAL                        
                                     EXCHANGE COMMISSION                  OMB Number:                       
                                     Washington, D.C. 20549             3235-0006

The institutional investment manager filing this report and the person by whom it is signed hereby represent
that the person signing the report is authorized to submit it, that all information contained herein is
true, correct and complete, and that it is understood that all required items, statements, schedules, lists,
and tables, are considered integral parts of this form.
